entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Memory not being collected back #80351
  • Implementation of a static virtual method in a derived type is not found when there is a re-abstraction of the same method higher in inheritance hierarchy #80350
  • String concatenation - slight performance regression in .NET 7 (7.0.1) compared to .NET 6 #80348
  • [API Proposal]: `IByteConvertible<TSelf>` #80345
  • A potential bug in FileStream (async + buffer)? #80344
  • Crash when running a csc compiled program in mono VM #80342
  • [API Proposal]: Mergeable dictionary (mutable and persistent) #80339
  • NativeAOT publish for DLL does not set automatically RID #80338
  • [API Proposal]: Add Int128 and UInt128 `BitConverter.GetBytes` support #80337
  • WebApplicationBuilder ILoggingBuilder does not enable logging by default #80336
    Future

Closed

  • Required Members doesn't work on .NET 6.0 #80346
  • The certificate data cannot be read with the provided password, the password may be incorrect - When a docker container is set to automatically restart or manually restarted #79707
  • [API Proposal]: tweak IndexOfAnyValues<T> public API surface to drop dead paths #80340
  • Optimize BigInteger "DataTip" speed #17453
    Future
  • Binary DataContractSerializer serialization is broken in .NET 7 for floating point data types #78913
    7.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • Add a debug only config knob to control the maximum force inline depth #80349
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove System.Security.Permissions from S.C.CM. #80347
    area-System.Configuration, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues for shorter set repeaters #80341
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • Fix most violations of new CA1859 #80335
    area-Meta
  • [NativeAOT] Objective-C exception propagation #80334
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • [LoongArch64] amend the ABI for the tests: #80326
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [NativeAOT] clone the QueueUserAPC2 related definitions to not require 22621 Windows sdk #80333
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Mark Task.IsFaulted as ensuring that Task.Exception is non-null #80278
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • Add debugger display for huge BigInteger #75796
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Clarify INumber.IsPositive and INumber.IsNegative documentation #80026
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix nullable annotations in ITypedList #80033
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Restore Advance when reading float/double with XmlBufferReader. #80274
    area-Serialization, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Add more specialized frozen collection types. #79794
    area-System.Collections
  • Updated type of heap_segment_survived from int to size_t to facilitate survival > 2GB. #80302
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add IsDynamicCodeSupported Feature Switch #80246
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Decommit memory as needed #79912
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2082512 #80322
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Enforce HttpClient limits on GetFromJsonAsync #79386
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Fix parsing the output of `ping` on Samsung phones #80133
    area-System.Net
  • Allow Base64Decoder to ignore space chars, add IsValid methods and tests #79334
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Text.Json TryGetDateTimeOffset String=\u007F\u007F Error=Index was outside the bounds of the array. #29820
  • System.TypeLoadException when running a simple specific code #29819

PullRequests

Created

  • update eol list #29818
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Add DynamicCodeSupport Feature Switch #29785

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fresh clone gold bar: "Current solution contains incorrect configurations mappings" #66315
  • Bad code generation -- needless and unavoidable allocation #66314
  • Errors about prohibiting pointer fields on records not shown in the code, they're only visible on the build output #66312

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve logging of rude edits and write analysis log to disk #66318
    Area-Interactive
  • Added table of content to source-generators.cookbook.md #66317
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Allow specifying expected IL verification baseline #66316
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove CS1701 and CS1702 warnings #66313
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Do not copy nullable value type receiver of a constrained call. #66311
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main #66306
    Area-Infrastructure, Next

Updated

  • Solution services cleanup #64160
    Area-IDE
  • Ref safety visitor: replace GetVal and GetRef methods with CheckVal and CheckRef #66155
    Area-Compilers
  • Delete Compilers.sln and keep only Compilers.slnf #65802
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Handle capturing of primary constructor parameters within queries and in type-or-value scenarios #66254
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Enable switch dispatch for is-expressions #65874
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Support netmodules in `MetadataReference` factory methods #66076
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Create an animation or wait until the subpage is properly loaded in balzor server side #45952
  • Blazor TextArea Not Updating #45951
  • PreventDefault as a method on Blazor event arguments #45949
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #45948
  • Perf improvement: stage1publishaot #45947

Closed

  • Perf improvement: plaintext, stage1vanilla #45899
  • Perf regression: https #45937
  • Perf regression: mapaction, plaintext #45943

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump json5 from 2.2.1 to 2.2.3 in /src/Components/CustomElements/src/js #45953
    area-blazor, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies

Merged

  • [AOT] Audit dynamic code flags and add comments #45946
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1
  • Update README.md #45920
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Introduce per-HealthCheckRegistration parameters #42646
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Add infrastructure for RequestDelegateGenerator #45924
    area-web-frameworks
  • Add Kestrel transports to solution filters #45933
    area-runtime
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2082690 #45630
    area-mvc, * NO MERGE *
  • Update to net8.0 SDK #45879
    area-infrastructure
  • StringUtilities with xplat-intrinsics (and a little perf-tuning) #44040
    area-runtime, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [iOS] App exceptions on physical device, but works on the simulator #12503
  • FlexLayout inside a Grid doesn't update row Height correctly with Direction=Row and Wrap=Wrap #12502
  • Vibrate behavior inconsistent between Android and iOS #12501
  • Shell does not always raise Navigating event on Windows #12500
  • Shell Tabbar visibility bug on Windows #12499
  • Switching Tabs after resuming from background throws System.NullReferenceException on Android #12498

Closed

  • Could not find a valid Xcode app bundle at '/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools' #12410

PullRequests

Updated

  • Process ContainerView through mapper and fix NeedsContainer logic #12260
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #12486
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How can I dynamically check that all changed entries tracked by change tracker relate to same aggregate? #30007
  • @MarounMaroun #30006
  • Wrong SQL translating from LINQ to SQL looking for all users that have all the specified claims. #30005
